fixed_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 130.8/139.1/147.4% of Attack. Gain 1 to 2 Blessing stacks.
fixed_skill.name: Kougaon

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase Attack by 15.7% for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Attack Master III

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 90.6/99.3/108.0% of Attack. Low chance to deal a Bless insta-kill effect to foes with 50% or less HP. Increase chance based on foe's missing HP.
innate_skill.name: Hamaon

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Bless damage to foes below 50% HP by 32%. When only 1 foe is present, increase effect by 50% more.
passive_skill.name: Scales of Harmony

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Bless damage dealt to foes below 50% HP by 37%. When only 1 foe is present, increase effect by 50% more.
passive_skill.name: Scales of Harmony I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Bless damage to foes below 50% HP by 41%. When only 1 foe is present, increase effect by 50% more.
passive_skill.name: Scales of Harmony II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
